title: Precious Puppies.
body: Our 11 day old babies are thriving!!

title: Availability Update.
body: Cashmere and Corduroy's first litter of puppies, born on May 1st 2025 will be ready for their forever homes on June 25th 2025. Puppies will be 8 weeks old as of June 25th 2025!! Be certain to inquire about how to place a deposit on either one of the puppies you might like us to reserve for you asap!!

title: Puppy Cuddle Puddle!!
body: We couldn't help but snap a picture while our puppies enjoyed a restful nap together. They are the cutest!

title: New Born Puppies!!
body: On May 1st 2025 Cashmere, our beloved Pomeranian went into labor around 4:30am. Later in the morning she brought 2 healthy babies into our lives. We are proud to introduce Cashmere's first litter of puppies!!

title: Posts and Updates Coming Soon!
body: Stay tuned for updates on when the puppies are born and more! Check back soon!
